ch0007_41_acerola/0101_0701_01_10:
Hiya, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Riding solo? Then welcome aboard!
ch0007_41_acerola/0101_0701_02_10:
Hoist the sails! It’s time to set out onto the
open sea!
ch0007_41_acerola/7101_0701_01_10:
I’m so glad Gardenia could become good friends
with Dhelmise!
ch0007_41_acerola/7101_0701_02_10:
I want her to become closer with other ghost
Pokémon too, though.
ch0007_41_acerola/7101_0701_03_10:
How do you think I can get her to warm up to
them more?
ch0007_41_acerola/7102_0701_01_10:
I saw a school of Jellicent on the night of the full
moon—it was so pretty!
ch0007_41_acerola/7102_0701_02_10:
All those blue and pink Jellicent were bobbing on
the water like buoys...
ch0007_41_acerola/7102_0701_03_10:
But that’s actually how they wait for their prey to
appear, huh...
ch0007_41_acerola/7103_0701_01_10: Do you like hot or cold weather better?
ch0007_41_acerola/7103_0701_02_10:
I like both! I always have a good time as long as
I’m with ghost Pokémon!
ch0007_41_acerola/7103_0701_03_10:
Besides, hanging out with ghost Pokémon helps me
stay cool even during the summer!
ch0007_41_acerola/7104_0701_01_10: I really wanna try exploring a ghost ship!
ch0007_41_acerola/7104_0701_02_10:
I could probably meet lots of ghost Pokémon I’ve
never seen before!
ch0007_41_acerola/7104_0701_03_10: But...what if the ship sails away...
ch0007_41_acerola/7104_0701_04_10: and I never come back from the ghost world?
ch0007_41_acerola/7105_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s go find that
hidden treasure on Pasio!
ch0007_41_acerola/7105_0701_03_10:
Apparently, Lear’s Hoopa hid his treasure
somewhere.
ch0007_41_acerola/1701_0701_01_10: Ta-da! Any guesses as to what this is?
ch0007_41_acerola/1701_0701_02_10: The answer is...a special present from me!
ch0007_41_acerola/1701_0702_01_10: I really hope you like it!
ch0007_41_acerola/2501_0701_01_10:
Hehe! What do you think of my outfit? Pretty,
isn’t it?
ch0007_41_acerola/2501_0701_02_10: Lana and Lillie helped me pick it out!
ch0007_41_acerola/2501_0701_03_10:
It’s flowy, pretty, and keeps me cool in this heat.
It’s my favorite outfit!
ch0007_41_acerola/2501_0702_01_10: Lana promised to teach me how to fish sometime!
ch0007_41_acerola/2501_0702_02_10: She said she’d make a fishing rod just for me, too!
ch0007_41_acerola/2501_0702_03_10:
There are no wild Pokémon on Pasio, though...
I wonder what we’d reel in?
ch0007_41_acerola/2511_0701_01_10:
In Alola, there’s a beach on Ula’ula Island that’s
covered in black sand.
ch0007_41_acerola/2511_0701_02_10:
The sandcastles you can build with it look
sooo cool!
ch0007_41_acerola/2511_0701_03_10:
And sometimes you can find good stuff lying on
the ground there, too!
ch0007_41_acerola/2511_0702_01_10:
Make sure to check out the beach with black sand
if you ever visit Alola!
ch0007_41_acerola/2511_0702_02_10:
Oh! The place is close to a trial site though, so
be careful!
ch0007_41_acerola/2511_0702_03_10: You’ll be in a lot of trouble if you anger a tapu...
ch0007_41_acerola/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! The bright morning sun reminds me
of Alola!
ch0007_41_acerola/3003_0701_01_10:
Are you drinking enough water? You’ll dry up and
wither away if you aren’t!
ch0007_41_acerola/3005_0701_01_10:
The ghost Pokémon seem antsy... Is there gonna
be a festival or something?
